## utils namespace

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | Class for representing coordinates and positions. |
|  [Rect](./blockly.utils_namespace.rect_class.md) | Class for representing rectangular regions. |
|  [Size](./blockly.utils_namespace.size_class.md) | Class for representing sizes consisting of a width and height. |
|  [Svg](./blockly.utils_namespace.svg_class.md) | A name with the type of the SVG element stored in the generic. |

|  [KeyCodes](./blockly.utils_namespace.keycodes_enum.md) | <p>Key codes for common characters.</p><p>Copied from Closure's goog.events.KeyCodes</p><p>This list is not localized and therefore some of the key codes are not correct for non US keyboard layouts. See comments below.</p> |
